title.rendered: How Will the Inflation Reduction Act Affect Your Taxes?

content.rendered:
With the recent passing of The Inflation Reduction Act, individuals who have unfiled tax years or unpaid tax debt may now expect an increase in IRS collection enforcement. Affordable CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang explain how the Inflation Reduction Act can directly affect taxpayers and how to get compliant with the IRS.

If You Need Tax Help, Contact Us Today for a Free Consultation

excerpt.rendered: Affordable CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang explain how the Inflation Reduction Act can directly affect taxpayers and how to get compliant with the IRS.
